summary: The Jack Dorsey-run payments giant is infringing on the accounting firm’s family of trademarks, H&R Block claims.
title: Tax Preparer H&R Block Sues Block Over Rebranding From Square
content: What’s in a name? In this case, a lawsuit.
Fintech and digital payments giant Block, Inc., formerly known as Square, is being sued by tax preparation services company H&R Block for trademark infringement.
Read more: Jack Dorsey Takes Square Deep Down the Bitcoin Rabbit Hole
